title: Are some of the Katarina spell particles not finished?
body:
Because Warring Kingdoms Katarina has no particles changes on the dropped q the spin and the e

I like the project particles and stuff alot though
https://youtu.be/E8ByzmGwXKc?t=2m11s

replies.body: Yes. There will be more going up before she goes live

Rito, just a personal request from me. Can you remove the ward jump on katarina? This makes her really unkillable, comes from bush do a lot of damage and kill the carries then ward jumps away. This gives her too much mobility as far as i'm concerned. For example lee sin, yes he does have a ward jump but he doesnt have resets like katarina does and have the dashing animation which we can deny the ward jump. Maybe i'm asking for way too much but her jump lacks counterplay, instantly dashing from one place to another and can do it again if you kill someone. :D Sorry for long post, here is a potato
Dude... Did you even look at surrenderat20 before asking this? They already removed the ward jumps.

How about LeBlanc? Her new E (Ethereal Chains) is using a portion of her old E's VFX. I'm not sure if it's intentional but it doesn't really fit the ability well visually/thematically and looks quite outdated. 

I made a thread about it here if you want to take a look: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/GfhEF7Ve-leblancs-new-e-ethereal-chains-is-using-the-old-visuals
Is Leblanc also not fully updated? Because her mimicked spells are the same color as her originals
